item.title: 安德森-霍洛维茨（Andreessen Horowitz）融资 72 亿美元，计划在 2025 年实现更多融资
item.description: 安德森-霍洛维茨公司（Andreessen Horowitz）是硅谷最大的风险投资公司之一，该公司已筹集到 72 亿美元的新资金。【原文：Andreessen Horowitz, one of Silicon Valley’s biggest venture capital firms, has raised $7.2 billion in new funding — a sizable haul after a rocky period for the startup world.】

item.title: 伊朗发动袭击后看涨石油期权交易创纪录
item.description: 在以色列誓言对伊朗周末的导弹和无人机袭击做出回应后，看涨石油期权的成交量飙升至创纪录水平。【原文：Volumes of bullish oil options surged to a record after Israel vowed to respond to Iran’s weekend missile and drone attack.】

item.title: PGIM 旨在从华尔街银行曾主导的业务中分一杯羹
item.description:
私人信贷呢？首席执行官大卫-亨特（David Hunt）表示，资产管理公司也在关注这一领域

。【原文：

And private credit? Asset managers are looking there, too, CEO David Hunt says

】

item.title: 拉加德称若通胀进一步缓解欧洲央行将降息
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，只要冲击不会使欧元区通胀放缓脱轨，欧洲央行就会接近降息。【原文：The European Central Bank is closing in on a reduction in interest rates as long as shocks don’t derail the slowdown in euro-zone inflation, according to President Christine Lagarde.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利淡化对财富管理客户的调查
item.description: 摩根士丹利表示，联邦对其监控财富管理客户背景的工作进行调查并不是什么新鲜事，而且该银行已经核算了修复相关流程的成本。【原文：Morgan Stanley said federal inquiries about its efforts to monitor the background of its wealth management clients aren’t new, and that the bank has already accounted for the costs of fixing its related processes.】

item.title: 抑郁症试验成功，制药商 Intra-Cellular 业绩飙升
item.description: 细胞内治疗公司（Intra-Cellular Therapies Inc.【原文：Intra-Cellular Therapies Inc. soared the most in more than two years after its top-selling drug succeeded in a trial of major depressive disorder, potentially opening up a lucrative new market.】

item.title: 芬兰推出 30 亿欧元紧缩方案以遏制债务增长
item.description: 芬兰政府同意采取 30 亿欧元（32 亿美元）的额外紧缩措施，旨在平衡这个北欧国家日益恶化的公共财政状况。【原文：Finland’s government agreed on a €3 billion ($3.2 billion) of additional austerity measures aimed at balancing the Nordic country’s deteriorating public finances.】

item.title: 风险叠加，特斯拉价值跌破 5000 亿美元
item.description: 特斯拉公司股价延续了2024年的跌势，将这家电动汽车制造商的市场估值推至5000亿美元以下，本周的一轮裁员进一步恶化了市场对该公司的情绪。【原文：Tesla Inc. shares extended their decline for 2024, pushing the electric-vehicle maker’s market valuation below $500 billion, as a round of job cuts this week further soured sentiment around the company.】

item.title: 埃尔-埃里安称强势美元和美国高利率 "冻结 "了世界
item.description: 穆罕默德-埃尔-埃里安（Mohamed El-Erian）认为，全世界的政策制定者都在努力应对不断飙升的美元和高企的美国利率。【原文：Policymakers around the world are struggling to confront a surging greenback and lofty US interest rates, according to Mohamed El-Erian.】

item.title: 约翰-保尔森的 "赚钱机器 "在 2023 年大幅上涨后仍处于亏损状态
item.description: 约翰-保尔森（John Paulson）家族办公室的业绩反弹提高了去年的回报率，但这仍不足以让这位亿万富翁投资者不再奋起直追。【原文：A rebound at John Paulson’s family office boosted returns last year but it still wasn’t enough to keep the billionaire investor from having to play catch-up.】

item.title: 英国任命 Jessica Pulay 为债务管理办公室主任
item.description: 英国政府已任命杰西卡-普莱（Jessica Pulay）为英国债务管理办公室主任，接替任职十多年后即将卸任的罗伯特-斯特曼（Robert Stheeman）。【原文：The UK government has appointed Jessica Pulay as head of the nation’s Debt Management Office, succeeding Robert Stheeman who’s stepping down after over a decade at the post.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称，意大利和法国的债务山脉再次上升
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）表示，欧元区的第二大和第三大经济体在经过三年的时间修复其濒临崩溃的公共财政后，即将再次债台高筑。【原文：The euro zone’s second and third-biggest economies are about to pile on debt again after three years of fixing their pandemic-bloated public finances, the International Monetary Fund said.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称欧洲央行降息时将关注地缘政治风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲中央银行将在 6 月份开始降息时监控地缘政治风险。【原文：The European Central Bank will monitor geopolitical risks as it embarks on interest-rate cuts in June, Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）上调全球经济增长预测，但警告存在风险
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）上调了对今年全球经济增长的预期，称美国和一些新兴市场的经济增长强劲，同时警告说，在通胀和地缘政治风险持续存在的情况下，前景依然谨慎。【原文：The International Monetary Fund inched up its expectations for global economic growth this year, citing strength in the US and some emerging markets, while warning the outlook remains cautious amid persistent inflation and geopolitical risks.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）警告：苏纳克面临大选，增长率在七国集团中排名倒数第二
国际货币基金组织（IMF）就支出和债务膨胀问题向美国发出警告
item.description: 位于华盛顿特区的国际货币基金组织总部。【原文：The International Monetary Fund headquarters in Washington, DC.】

item.title: PGIM 首席执行官亨特称，私人信贷市场将迎来 "大洗牌
item.description: PGIM 首席执行官戴维-亨特（David Hunt）表示，随着投资者对经理人的选择提出更高的标准，私人信贷市场正在经历一场 "洗牌"。【原文：PGIM Chief Executive Officer David Hunt said the private credit market is headed for a “shakeout” as investors set higher standards for which managers they choose.】

item.title: 赞比亚穆索科特瓦内公司有望在数月内达成商业债权人协议
item.description: 赞比亚在完成马拉松式债务重组方面取得了良好进展，并有信心很快与其余债权人达成协议。【原文：Zambia has made good progress in concluding a marathon debt restructuring and is confident of soon striking deals with its remaining creditors.】

item.title: 中国东风计划在意大利年产 10 万辆汽车
item.description: 中国东风汽车集团股份有限公司正在与意大利政府就在该国生产汽车进行早期谈判，以促进其国际业务的发展。【原文：China’s Dongfeng Motor Group Co. is in early talks with the Italian government about making cars in the country to help boost its international business.】

item.title: 如果美联储加息真的引发了美国经济繁荣？
item.description: 随着美国经济月复一月地蓬勃发展，创造了数十万个新的就业机会，并使那些警告经济即将衰退的专家们感到困惑，华尔街的一些人开始接受一种边缘经济理论。【原文：As the US economy hums along month after month, minting hundreds of thousands of new jobs and confounding experts who had warned of an imminent downturn, some on Wall Street are starting to entertain a fringe economic theory.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利交易员盈利增长 14%，超预期反弹
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的交易员第一季度收入超出预期，其财富管理巨头也重回正轨—；这两方面都为其新任领导人泰德-皮克（Ted Pick）赢得了关键胜利。【原文：Morgan Stanley’s traders delivered first-quarter revenue that exceeded expectations as its wealth management juggernaut also got back on track — both handing a key win for its new leader Ted Pick.】

item.title: 华尔街为大众带来私人市场繁荣
item.description: 纪念股票一族希望在私人资产的稀有世界中分得一杯羹，而目前——华尔街上任何人只要能给他们钱，就能赚大钱。【原文：The meme-stock crowd wants a piece of the rarefied world of private assets, and — for now — there’s big money to be made on Wall Street for anyone who can give it to them.】

item.title: 尽管拜登提出了爱尔兰共和军的要求，但中国在清洁技术方面的优势仍超过了美国
item.description:
随着彭博能源与气候峰会（BloombergNEF summit on energy and climate）的召开，美国太阳能、风能和电池供应链出现了新的警示信号。【原文：

There are fresh warning signs for American supply chains in solar, wind and batteries as the BloombergNEF summit on energy and climate begins.

】

item.title: 莱茵金属推进立陶宛弹药厂建设
item.description: 德国莱茵金属股份公司（Rheinmetall AG）推进了在立陶宛建设弹药厂的计划，预计这将成为波罗的海国家最大的国防工业投资，并将促进该地区的安全。【原文：Germany’s Rheinmetall AG moved forward with plans to build an ammunition plant in Lithuania that’s expected to become the biggest defense industry investment in the Baltic nation and boost the region’s security.】

item.title: 中国牛肉市场疲软给主要供应商巴西带来风险
item.description: 在消费放缓和国内供应充足的情况下，中国的牛肉进口正在减少，这对其最大的供应国巴西造成了打击。【原文：China’s beef imports are dwindling amid slowing consumption and ample domestic supply, dealing a blow to its biggest supplier Brazil.】

item.title: 津巴布韦新任中央银行行长誓言重拾投资者信心
item.description: 津巴布韦新任央行行长发誓要恢复人们对该机构的信心，因为该机构在稳定物价和国家货币方面屡屡失败。【原文：Zimbabwe’s new central bank governor vowed to restore confidence in the institution that’s repeatedly failed to stabilize prices and the nation’s currency.】

item.title: 金美利奇在代理权争夺战中放弃银弓合并提案
item.description: 基默里奇能源管理公司（Kimmeridge Energy Management Co.【原文：Kimmeridge Energy Management Co. withdrew a proposal to combine shale driller SilverBow Resources Inc. with its own natural gas unit and instead focus on appointing three new board members to the company.】

item.title: 奋进公司被控误导两座非洲金矿的买家
item.description: 奋进矿业公司（Endeavour Mining Plc）被 Lilium Mining 指控在出售两座非洲金矿的问题上存在虚假陈述，而下台的首席执行官塞巴斯蒂安-德-蒙特苏斯（Sebastien de Montessus）任期的余波仍在继续。【原文：Endeavour Mining Plc has been accused by Lilium Mining of misrepresentation over the sale of two African gold mines, as the fallout from the tenure of ousted Chief Executive Officer Sebastien de Montessus continues.】

item.title: Altice 债务闹剧为欧洲带来美国式债权人合作
item.description: 法国 Altice 公司即将进行的债务谈判可能会使美国重组市场的另一个出口冲击欧洲。【原文：Altice France’s upcoming debt negotiations could see another export of the US restructuring market hitting Europe.】

item.title: PNC 净利息收入低于预期，贷款增长乏力
item.description: PNC Financial Services Group Inc. 第一季度净利息收入不及预期，这表明这家总部位于匹兹堡的贷款公司仍在为贷款增长乏力而苦苦挣扎。【原文：PNC Financial Services Group Inc. missed estimates for net interest income in the first quarter, a sign that the Pittsburgh-based lender has continued to struggle with muted loan growth.】
